item.description:
下午6点到晚上8点

Our stable location is in Kresge 201 in the most gracious and globally conscious Harvard School of Public Health.

All Mandarin speakers (and English-speakers, too) need to register IN ADVANCE to get an HSPH building permission for the night.

E-Mail LMA_Mandarin@YMail.com to register your intent AND sign YES on this meetup.

下午6点到晚上8点3

We need your request by 4 pm the day before the Tuesday evening event.
item.how_to_find_us: Have you completed the diplomatic measures required for you to have building access the night of the event?

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Mandarin-English bilingual chats @HSPH in Longwood Medical Area 下午6点到晚上8点
